content.heading: Check Server Status
content.description: Verify if the server is down and check the server logs for any critical errors that might cause the page to break.

content.heading: Validate URL Routing
content.description: Ensure that the URL routing is correctly configured to the product page. Check .htaccess and router settings.

content.heading: Update Product Links
content.description: Review and update all product links in the content management system to ensure they are not broken.

2.name: Product Page Taken Offline by Error

content.heading: Audit CMS Entries
content.description: Check the CMS for any incorrect settings or errors that could lead to the product page being taken offline.

content.heading: Restore from Backup
content.description: If the page was taken offline by error, restore it from the most recent backup if available.

content.heading: Optimize Images
content.description: Reduce the file size of images without losing quality to enhance page loading speed.

content.heading: Minimize HTTP Requests
content.description: Combine CSS and JavaScript files where possible to reduce the number of server requests.

content.heading: Check Image Paths
content.description: Ensure all image paths are correct and the images are uploaded to the server.

content.heading: Enable Lazy Loading
content.description: Implement lazy loading for images to improve page load times and handle missing images gracefully.

content.heading: Validate Hyperlinks
content.description: Regularly check and validate all hyperlinks on the site to ensure they are not broken.

content.heading: Implement Redirects
content.description: Set up server-side redirects for any links that have changed to maintain SEO and user experience.

content.heading: Audit Product URLs
content.description: Conduct a full audit of all product URLs to ensure they match the live URLs in the inventory system.

content.heading: Update Link Sources
content.description: Update any outdated links in the marketing materials or on affiliate sites.
